data.title: Jewish Insights - Part 2
data.text:
Naftali Kalfa & Aaron Razel “Achim Anachnu – We Are Brothers”

Special for the Month of Elul Naftali Kalfa featuring Aaron Razel in a new single “Achim Anachnu – We Are Brothers.” A unique & special collaboration with a message of unity & strength for the Jewish Nation. The song is

TORAH MISINAI – Naftali Kalfa & Shlomi Cohen

A new song & Video for Shavuot by Naftali Kalfa & Shlomi Cohen. Composed by Naftali Kalfa & Shlomi Cohen Vocals: Naftali Kalfa & Shlomi Cohen Guitars: Shlomi Cohen Produced & arranged by Amit Golan Recorded mixed & mastered by

Yosi & Avi Piamenta Sing With Naftali Kalfa “Yaancha”

The first musical collaboration between Yosi & Avi Piamenta & Naftali Kalfa was the album “Yehyu Leratzon” released 6 years ago. Upon Naftali learning of Yosi’s current medical situation, he composed the song “Yaancha”, which is based on the 20th

Read More

Gad Elbaz & Naftali Kalfa ft. Ari Lesser A New Hit for Purim “Miracles/Al Hanissim‎”

Ari Lesser a prominent rapper who was features on the JEWISH STAR competition comes to the fore front of Jewish music as he is featured on this new song with judge Gad Elbaz. Responsible for this connection was Naftali Kalfa

Read More

“The Naftali Kalfa Project”, A Double Album Featuring 28 Original Songs By Naftali

Naftali hosts top artists on this album such as: Gad Elbaz, Yosef Chaim Shwekey, Benny Elbaz, Shlomo Katz, Shyne the rapper, Yossi Piamenta, Yehuda Glantz, Yehuda Solomon (Moshav Band) and many more … Naftali Kalfa, was born in Toronto, Canada

A Special and Exciting Collaboration Naftali Kalfa & Yosef Chaim Shwekey “REFAENU” Off The Upcoming “The Naftali Kalfa Project,”

The song is from the album “The Naftali Kalfa Project” which is being released this coming week, a double album with 28 original songs. Naftali hosts top artists on this album such as: Gad Elbaz, Yosef Chaim Shwekey, Benny Elbaz,

“Ha’am Sheli” (My People), Lazer Lloyd and Friends

Lazer Lloyd, an Israeli guitarist and singer/songwriter, wrote a song entitled “Ha’am Sheli” (meaning “My People” or “My Nation” in Hebrew) in response to the frictions and tensions between different groups of Jews – especially in Israel. Lazer explains, “Before

Read More

A Song of Protest – Free Jonathan Pollard – Benny Elbaz & Naftali Kalfa

Ahead of President Obama’s visit to Israel, Israeli artist Benny Elbaz and Torontonian Naftali Kalfa, unite their voices in a call for JUSTICE for Jonathan Pollard. FREE JONATHAN POLLARD!

Read More

“Ana Hashem” Naftali Kalfa ft Shlomo Katz

“Ana Hashem” is the fourth single from Naftali Kalfa’s upcoming new album “The Naftali Kalfa project”. Naftali Kalfa is a businessman and singer/composer who was born in Toronto, Canada on February 22nd, 1981. He is the eldest of eleven brothers
